name: Split square
description:
Split Square is a deck building rogue-like game, and the key system of this game is that you can adjust your deck to your environment by putting your possession skills in and out of the deck at any time between battles.

Players can achieve synergy based on many factors, such as element, condition state, projectiles, and so on. Players will build their own decks in a changing environment with the items they get as they go through the game.
